definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The sensitization-homeostasis model can also explain dependence-related tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 这个致敏衡定模型也可以解释依赖相关耐受性。

sentences.english: To investigate the impact of megestrol on chemotherapy tolerance in patients with cancer.
sentences.chinese: 观察甲地孕酮对肿瘤患者化疗耐受性的影响。

sentences.english: Sweden has one of the world's highest percentages of lactase tolerant people.
sentences.chinese: 其中瑞典为乳糖耐受性比例最高的国家。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the tolerance to carvedilol in elderly patients with chronic heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估卡维地洛治疗老年心力衰竭患者的耐受性。

sentences.english: We sought to define the tolerability of warfarin among an elderly inception cohort with atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 我们寻求界定其在老年房颤病人队列中的耐受性。

sentences.english: Long-term renal tolerance of entecavir was good and side effects were minimal.
sentences.chinese: 恩替卡韦的长期肾耐受性好，并且副作用最小。

sentences.english: Chronic paraldehyde intoxication results in tolerance and dependence.
sentences.chinese: 慢性副醛中毒能导致耐受性和依赖性。

sentences.english: This medication is found to be well-tolerated by most cats.
sentences.chinese: 这种药物被发现多数猫耐受性良好。

sentences.english: Endurance is a supper-dominant character controlled by genes not less than two.
sentences.chinese: 耐受性是一种遗传性性状，由遗传基因控制。

sentences.english: Acid tolerance of EHEC O157:H7 is one characteristic that could hardly be controlled.
sentences.chinese: H7难以控制的原因之一是该菌对酸的耐受性。

sentences.english: The combined use of triamterene and enalapril was well tolerant.
sentences.chinese: 悦宁定与安体舒通长期联合应用具有良好的耐受性。

sentences.english: Temozolomide is well tolerated and is emerging as a feasible first-line choice.
sentences.chinese: 替莫唑胺耐受性良好，是新兴的可行的一线化疗药物。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the tolerance of healthy body on Lidan Rongshi soft capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价健康人体对利胆溶石软胶囊的耐受性。

sentences.english: Description Medicago sativa L. tolerance than high fescue more.
sentences.chinese: 说明紫花苜蓿比高羊茅的耐受性更强。

sentences.english: The more the body consumes, the more it tolerates it.
sentences.chinese: 身体饮用得越多，对它就越有耐受性。

definition: intolerance (for lactose, gluten or other foods)
